ComicInfo.Summary: The hits just keep on coming. Savage Dragon's latest girlfriend, Mighty Man, is laid to rest after her brutal murder. His daughter is taken away by the authorities and he is forced to kill Cesspool in self-defense. Dragon decides to assist in an effort to rescue SuperPatriot from a Covenant stronghold.
